task.title: Set up qTest integration via the setup wizard

taskbody.context: To set up qTest integration via the setup wizard, follow these steps:

step.cmd: To open the setup wizard, after checking the Enable Integration box, click Yes in the pop-up window.

info.p: Alternatively, you can also click on the Quick Setup... hyperlink.

image.alt: Open Setup Wizard via Quick Setup button

step.stepresult: The qTest Integration Setup Wizard dialog opens. Complete all items to finish the setup.

step.cmd: In the Authentication section, select your qTest version and enter you qTest account for authentication information.
step.info: In the version options, we recommend selecting 7 or higher. This is because earlier versions might be deprecated soon.
Click Connect account to establish connection with your qTest account.

step.cmd: In the qTest project section, select your project.

image.alt: Select qTest project in the Setup Wizard

step.cmd: In the Test Structure Mapping section, you need to map the tests between the two systems.

substep.cmd: In the qTest module section: select one of the qTest modules fetched from your account to store the uploaded Katalon test cases.

image.alt: Choose qTest module in the Setup Wizard

substep.cmd: In the Katalon Test Case Folder section: select a test case folder to integrate with the qTest module selected above.

image.alt: Select Katalon test case folder to map with qTest module

substep.cmd: In the Katalon Test Suite Folder section: select a test suite folder to integrate with the qTest module selected above.

image.alt: Select Katalon test suite folder in the Setup Wizard

step.cmd: In the Execution Options section, choose the settings for uploading results to qTest.

image.alt: Select submit options in the Setup Wizard

row.entry: Results of executed test cases are uploaded automatically to qTest.
Submit test run result to the latest approved version
Test run results are submitted to the latest approved version of the mapped qTest test case.
Additional attachments for reports to be uploaded to qTest. These report formats only apply to test suites. To learn more about test suite and test suite collection reports, see .

taskbody.result: You have successfully set up qTest integration with via the setup wizard.
